
import PartialFieldrefreference from "./fieldRef_reference.mdx"


<details className="config-field" data-expandable="true" open>
<summary>

####### `fieldRef` <span className="config-field-required" data-required="false">required</span> <span className="config-field-type"></span> <span className="config-field-default"></span> <span className="config-field-enum"></span> {#controlPlane-distro-k0s-env-valueFrom-fieldRef}

Selects a field of the pod: supports metadata.name, metadata.namespace, `metadata.labels['&lt;KEY&gt;']`, `metadata.annotations['&lt;KEY&gt;']`,
spec.nodeName, spec.serviceAccountName, status.hostIP, status.podIP, status.podIPs.

</summary>

<PartialFieldrefreference />


</details>
